column4: quoting is always fun. remember though that I own perhaps the copyright for what I have said if it is something original in the context and showing me in bad light with it is illegal. but I like the money.
I'll keep that in mind... i think i want a keyboard, so it's between that and... (dunno)
i think one Clie has a keyboard
I learnt the screen typing really fast. it's quite handy actually. and T3/5's on-screen-keyboard is quite big actually too if you enable it.
